title: Tube Distribution
author: Opentrons
description: Transfers samples from N tubes to the first N wells of a 384 well plate.
process:
Transfer (Transfer Volume) uL from first tube to first well in 384 well plate.
Repeat for all remaining tubes, with a new tip for each tube.

markdown.title: Tube Distribution
markdown.author: [Opentrons](https://opentrons.com/)
markdown.categories:
* Basic Pipetting
	* Plate Filling
* Sample Prep
	* Distribution
markdown.description: Transfers samples from N tubes to the first N wells of a 384 well plate.
markdown.process:
1. Transfer (Transfer Volume) uL from first tube to first well in 384 well plate.
2. Repeat for all remaining tubes, with a new tip for each tube.
